changeSet.author: EdwardLegaspi

changeSet.author: SebastienMichea
changeSet.sql: UPDATE BILLING_BILLING_RUN SET STATUS='PREINVOICED' WHERE STATUS='WAITING'
UPDATE BILLING_BILLING_RUN SET STATUS='PREVALIDATED' WHERE STATUS='ON_GOING'
UPDATE BILLING_BILLING_RUN SET STATUS='POSTINVOICED' WHERE STATUS='TERMINATED'
UPDATE BILLING_BILLING_RUN SET STATUS='POSTVALIDATED' WHERE STATUS='CONFIRMED'

changeSet.author: anasseh
changeSet.sql: UPDATE CAT_CHARGE_TEMPLATE SET UNIT_NB_DECIMAL=23 WHERE UNIT_NB_DECIMAL < 2

changeSet.author: anasseh
changeSet.sql: UPDATE CAT_CHARGE_TEMPLATE SET UNIT_NB_DECIMAL=12 WHERE UNIT_NB_DECIMAL > 12

changeSet.author: anasseh
changeSet.sql: delete from crm_custom_field_tmpl tm where provider_id is null and code in (select code from crm_custom_field_tmpl where provider_id is not null and applies_to = tm.applies_to )
update crm_custom_field_tmpl tm set provider_id = (select provider_id from adm_user where id = tm.creator_id) where tm.provider_id is null

changeSet.author: AndriusKarpavicius
anasseh
